name: Inverse Orbits
description:
Controls (that won't make sense without playing around)

  • Mouse click + drag to rotate view
  • Mouse scroll to zoom
  • 123 keys to select orbit to control
  • Spacebar to start or stop an orbit
  • QE (x axis), WS (y axis),  and AD (z axis) keys to move the lead orbit panel 
  • QEWSAD + left shift to rotate the lead orbit panel
  • Arrows keys and left/right arrows + left shift to adjust the orbit path
  • +- keys to adjust distance between orbit panels
  • <> keys to adjust orbit speed
  • R key to reset
  • Esc key to quit

If you encounter audio issues in the browser version, consider trying a standalone. Certain formations are also more prone to audio/performance issues; try unstacking each group of panels.
